attributes.action: sack the staff from Haringey council, associated with baby p's abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The life of a innocent 17month old boy was cruely ended by months of physical abuse,just 8 years after the Victoria Climbe case. The same council failed to protect the child after it was evident that numerous visits and examinations had been made which confirmed the serious abuse of the child.The head of Haringey council has refused to to sack the staff involved even though it is clear they ignored police advise to have the child taken away.how many more children will suffer as a result of this councils repeated failures? this cannot be allowed to happen again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
